name: Detecting Medical Disinformation
description: Training in recognizing false and misleading medical information used as a tool for control, suppression, and deception.

cards.title: Spotting False Medical Narratives in Mainstream Media
cards.description: Analyzing corporate-controlled media tactics used to promote misleading medical information.
cards.bulletpoints: Scripted messaging, narrative reinforcement, suppression of alternative medicine

cards.title: Understanding Pharma-Backed Disinformation Campaigns
cards.description: Unmasking the role of pharmaceutical conglomerates in controlling medical discourse.
cards.bulletpoints: Industry-funded studies, ghostwritten medical journals, suppression of generic treatments

cards.title: Social Engineering Tactics in Medical Propaganda
cards.description: Examining how psychological warfare is used to manipulate medical choices on a global scale.
cards.bulletpoints: Fear-based compliance, problem-reaction-solution cycles, false scarcity tactics
